duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage an HOA of 289 high-end condos with 35 employees and a budget of $7m+
Provide leadership and guidance to the HOA management team, ensuring effective collaboration and communication.
Utilize multi-discipline management skills to address various aspects of HOA operations and employee management.
Demonstrate emotional maturity and patience when dealing with challenging situations and stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Real Estate, or related field (Master's preferred)
